scripts.pack: npm run pack-chrome && npm run pack-firefox
scripts.pack-chrome: npm run build-chrome && rm -f ./build/chrome-extension.zip && pushd ./build/chrome/ && zip -r $OLDPWD/build/chrome-extension.zip * && popd
scripts.pack-firefox: npm run build-firefox && rm -f ./build/firefox-extension.zip && pushd ./build/firefox/ && zip -r $OLDPWD/build/firefox-extension.zip * && popd
scripts.build: npm run build-chrome && npm run build-firefox
scripts.build-chrome: GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false BUILD_PATH='./build/chrome' INLINE_RUNTIME_CHUNK=false react-scripts build && rm ./build/chrome/manifest-firefox.json
scripts.build-firefox: GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false BUILD_PATH='./build/firefox' INLINE_RUNTIME_CHUNK=false react-scripts build && rm ./build/firefox/manifest.json && mv ./build/firefox/manifest-firefox.json ./build/firefox/manifest.json
